::Battera::

She looked at him thoughtfully.  "He has no faction. He was a Pred 
before he was killed. But the Matrix sent him back to try to bring 
about peace."
She knew it sounded too outragous to be true, but she hoped that he 
would believe her. She may be pred but she was speaking the truth. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Rex::
> 
> Rex frowns, looking at Battera. "What faction is this Voluis?"
> 
> If Voluis was a Predacon, it was almost definite that it was some 
sort of 
> trap. Predacons were not ussually peaceful. He waits for her 
answer, 
> wondering if Kluster would rist a 'peace meeting' sponsored by 
Predacons.
